Blog.post: So Utahs kinda boring. Ive been playing video games and listening to my iPod and watching tv. Reading a book called Shogun thats pretty good. Ive reached a place where everythings sort of how it should be, leaving me with no goals. The goals I do have aren't really goals because theyve already been attained. Like I said I had and argument with courtney today. I really didn't like that. I don't like arguments. I do however like Death Cab for Cutie, and have recently purchased The Photo Album to go along with transatlanticism . Both are good, but I prefer transatlanticism . Pretty much all of the songs from transatlanticism remind me of Joan. The Postal Service- Give Up reminds me of Courtney. I need to stop listening to music. So the day before yesterday we went into town. That was when I bought the CD. That was also the day I began reading Shogun . We returned Secret Window, which was an amazing story. I love Stephen King's books. I read The Stand very recently and it was very good. Im looking for an eBook of 'A Separate Peace' by John Knowles, if anyone knows where I could find one. I need to start playing more DDR. I havent in too long. It seems like ive been procrastinating things all summer, and now theyre finally catching up to me in the form of "no, i wont let you sleep." I was up far too late last night lying motionlessly under the covers. I hate nights like that.

I got in a fight with courtney today. And i sorta miss her. But it sucks because we were never friends. Online we were, but that doesnt feel as real as it used to. I dont know how i feel about her. I mean.... im lying to so many people that i dont know what to write here. I feel terrible sometimes. Ill just listen to Death Cab for Cutie for now and feel alright. Thats alright. I just want to feel alright.

I dont feel good tonight. Funny how I havent included a link to this in my profile, nor told anyone I have this. I should get around to correcting that. I have strong feelings about this one person, and im not sure what to do about them. Im thinking wait it out, because it seems like the only logical option. Sorta see what happens.

Gmail is destroying the lives of everyone. Its become incredibly corrupt. Alex has recieved a gmail account and has since gone insane. I hope this sickness does not infect everyone. This sickness of greed...

i guess it could be said that i dont respond to change very well. or it could be said that girls these days are a bit on the trashy side. i dont know. if i hear about another girl younger than me thats participated in various sexual activities or thoughts ill throw up. its wrong, so wrong. SO FREAKING WRONG. in my world, people shouldnt do drugs, smoke, drink, or have young sex. i guess my world is gone.
